dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Elyria, a land of magic and wonder.

dialogues.speaker: Villain
dialogues.text: Ahahahaha! You think you can defeat me? I am the greatest sorcerer this world has ever known!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Not if I have anything to say about it. Let's end this, villain!

dialogues.speaker: Villain
dialogues.text: Foolish mortal! You will never leave this place alive.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: We'll see about that. Prepare to meet your doom!
